name: AdventHealth Orlando
description: Skilled master's level clinicians who are specially training and experienced conduct all mental health assessments. They carefully assess your needs, verify any mental health benefits you may have and provide a referral to a program that most closely meets your needs.  The Assessment Center also treats patients on an inpatient and outpatient basis.
